channel.title: This Site on @GrandomThoughts
channel.description: Recent content in This Site on @GrandomThoughts

item.title: New site; Oooh, Shiny
item.description: I’ve updated the site. So, look, the old site was a ton of work to manage, and I don’t even think my mom was reading it. At any rate, I recently saw a few mentions of Hugo. I finally took the time to dig into it, and I really like the way it works. Basically, it is a static site generator. No more php. No more fiddly cms to deal with.
